title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Goods & Services
body: Goods & Services       The National Park Service partners with two concessioners in the downstream end of the canal. The Boathouse at Fletchers Cove located at milepost 3.2 Bicycle and Kayak Rentals www.fletcherscove.com Thompson Boat Center located at milepost 0 Bicyle and Kayak Rentals www.thompsonboatcenter.com           Eastern National table at Great Falls Tavern. NPS photo  The C&O Canal partners with Eastern National to provide interpretive and educational materials for purchase in Visitor Centers in Great Falls, Ferry Hill, Williamsport and Cumberland. Your purchase provides support for programming in our park! You can also purchase materials online through Eastern National's website.
